# removeKeyCommand(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the key command from the view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeKeyCommand(_ keyCommand: UIKeyCommand)
```

## Parameters

- **keyCommand**: The key command to remove.

## Discussion

This method lets you easily remove key commands without overriding the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIResponder/keyCommands] property.

## Related Documentation

- **keyCommands**: The key commands that trigger actions on this responder.

## Accessing the available key commands

- **performsActionsWhilePresentingModally**: A Boolean value indicating whether the view controller performs menu-related actions.
- **addKeyCommand(_:)**: Associates the specified keyboard shortcut with the view controller.
